#  What do you want to do ?

- [ ] Create a quiz
- [ ] Fix or add something

### 路 What is the quiz about ?

- [ ] JavaScript
- [ ] CSS

- [ ] Otro

### 路 Title (e.g. Closures in JavaScript.)

### 路 Question (e.g. What is the output of the following code ?)

### 路 Main question code (or image if the quiz is related to CSS, UI... or if you want it.)

### 路 Answer options (It can be code or words like `undefined`.)

A.
B.
C.

### 路 Correct answer.

- [ ] A
- [ ] B
- [ ] C

### 路 Links you used for explanation.
